description: Windows DNS client allows denial of service due to uncontrolled resource consumption, leading to service unavailability. The issue stems from unregulated handling of DNS queries within the network stack, impacting systems when facing excessive queries from unauthorized attackers. This vulnerability can be exploited remotely, resulting in service disruption on affected builds: 10.0.22631.3155 and 10.0.22621.3155, associated with KB5034765.
